full_text: To: Hugh Hurwitz (b)(6) @bop.gov (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) (JMD)" (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) (OAG)" (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov From: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) (JMD)" (b)(6) @usdoj.gov Subject: RE: Statement Sent: Tue, 13 Aug 2019 17:41:23 +0000 OK here From: Hugh Hurwitz (b)(6) @bop.gov Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2019 1:33 PM To: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) (JMD)" (b)(6) @jmd.usdoj.gov (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) (OAG)" (b)(6) @jmd.usdoj.gov Subject: Re: Statement That is accurate. We are making the notices to the 2 staff and the warden right now. Will let you know when they are completed (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) (OAG)" (b)(6) @usdoj.gov 8/13/2019 1:31 PM This is the final. Are we OK? (b)(6) (b)(5) 8/13/19 1:29pm

additional_notes: The document contains redactions and is an email chain discussing a statement and notices to staff and a warden.
